name: roboticmower
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: You can use this skill to connect to your robotic mower and control it. When using this skill, it needs to be bound with your robotic-mower connect app account. After the binding is successful, you can use this skill to control your robotic mower. For example, say "Alexa, set {your robotic mower} to work." to your alexa, and your robotic mower will start working. In the same way, you can also control your robotic mower to stop, trim, return to charge, and use the "Alexa, what's the state of {your robotic mower}?" command to query the working status of your robotic mower.
